alert.note: Alert for Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 5:50PM CDT until July 04 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Scott County in west central Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 550 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Leoti, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Scott County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
